name: Data Shot
description:
Folk high school final project.

The world has been overrun by evil robots that are mean!!! Only you can stop them all with fighting!!!!!!

Fight back the robot threat with punches and totally cool high kicks!

Collect energy orbs to unleash the awesome power of DATA SHOT™®!

Make a YouTube video about this game and become LEG
endary!

Made by
Design/Programming: Taneli Aheristo
Art/Animation: Oona Pönni (DeviantArt)
Art/Animation: Anette Hansson (DeviantArt)
Music: Tatu Toukola (SoundCloud)
